tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cross_chain_swaps (
    swap_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 6) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cross_chain_swap_info (
    swap_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    from_chain_id UUID NOT NULL,
    to_chain_id UUID NOT NULL,
    from_asset VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    to_asset VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_networks (
    chain_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    chain_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    network_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CrossChainSwaps (
    swap_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EthereumSwaps (
    eth_swap_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    swap_id UUID NOT NULL,
    eth_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    received_amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_swap FOREIGN KEY (swap_id) REFERENCES CrossChainSwaps(swap_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BitcoinSwaps (
    btc_swap_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    swap_id UUID NOT NULL,
    btc_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    received_amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_swap FOREIGN KEY (swap_id) REFERENCES CrossChainSwaps(swap_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cross_chain_swaps (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    from_chain VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    to_chain VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    from_asset VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    to_asset VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CrossChainSwaps (
 swap_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 sender_address VARCHAR(255),
 receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
 sender_chain VARCHAR(50),
 receiver_chain VARCHAR(50),
 amount DECIMAL,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SwapTransactions (
 transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 swap_id UUID,
 from_address VARCHAR(255),
 to_address VARCHAR(255),
 amount DECIMAL,
 status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE ChainAssets (
 asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 chain_name VARCHAR(50),
 asset_name VARCHAR(50),
 token_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ChainValidators (
 validator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 chain_name VARCHAR(50),
 validator_address VARCHAR(255),
 stake_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ChainBlocks (
 block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 chain_name VARCHAR(50),
 block_number INT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
